meaning_str.bing:
n. 节约；节省；存款；节省物
adj. 可取的；保存的；俭约的；补偿的
prep. 除…以外
v. “save”的现在分词
网络. 储蓄；搭救；储存

可取的；保存的；俭约的；补偿的

节约；节省；积蓄；储蓄；储蓄金；存款；节省量；节约额
节省的；节约的；节俭的；省钱的
储蓄；拯救；节约；保留；保护；救助；（save的现在分词）

1.en: Rachel also gives great advice on packing light and her biggest time saving tip of having a toiletries bag ready to go at all times.
1.cn: 雷切尔还对如何轻装上阵有着极好的建议，还有她节约时间的法宝：随身随时携带化妆包。

2.en: NoteDepending on the type of file you are saving, you might be able to add file properties like tags at the time that you save the file.
2.cn: 注意根据正在保存的文件类型，可以在保存文件时添加标记等文件属性。

3.en: He acknowledges he must begin saving money for an apartment, but he resents being judged by his inability to purchase property.
3.cn: 但小张承认必须开始攒钱买房，不过他讨厌用能否买得起房来衡量他的能力。

0.en: What were you doing? I was saving Smackle.
0.cn: 那你干什么去了？我当时正忙着救史麦科。

1.cn: 西岸的空气质量幸免于难。

2.en: Thank you, Miss Rabbit, for saving my Tiddles. No problem. Thank you for saving us too. Just do my job. Goodbye.
2.cn: 太感谢了，兔子小姐，是你救了小土豆一命。不用客气，女士。谢谢你也救了我们几个。这是我的工作，再见啦。

3.en: Thank you for saving my life. I love you, Richard Parker.
3.cn: 感谢你救了我的命，我爱你，理查德·帕克。

4.en: Well, hear me out. Howard, you know we're saving up for a house.
4.cn: 听我说完嘛。霍华德，你知道我们在存钱买房子。

5.en: I will tell you what is happening. I am saving my best friend's marriage.
5.cn: 我来告诉你是要闹哪样，我要以身拯救我死党的婚姻。

6.en: Those look, comfortable. They are. Thank you for saving the day back there.
6.cn: 鞋子看起来,很舒服。是的。谢谢你让我脱离了这无聊的派对。

7.en: And then to have him ended up saving my life was the irony of the whole thing.
7.cn: 而让他停止挽救我的生命则会是对整件事的讽刺。

8.en: Honey, that thing I did back there for Peeta? That was called "saving his life."
8.cn: 亲爱的，刚才我为皮塔做的事情叫做救他的命。

9.en: I got some news for you. You're not saving the species tonight or any other night.
9.cn: 听清楚，你今晚救不了种族，以后也救不了!

10.en: Saving your life in London put me in a tight spot with some very dangerous people.
10.cn: 在伦敦救你的事，让我陷入了非常危险的处境。

11.en: Everybody here, all of us, spend our days saving the lives of people we don't even know.
11.cn: 我们这里的每个人都在拯救素不相识的人。

12.en: Fine, I'll go out and buy you another box with the money I was saving for a Wet&Wild lip liner.
12.cn: 好啦，我再出去给你买盒新的，就用我存下来要买唇线笔的钱好啦。

13.en: So their plan for saving the Earth from Armageddon is hoping a bunch of scientists can catch a ball?
13.cn: 所以他们拯救地球免于受末日般灾害的计划就是希望一帮书呆科学家能接住球吗？

14.en: You can stay here. Dorothy I have to. I will be a medic. I figure I'll be saving people not killing.
14.cn: 你能留在这儿。多萝西，我必须。我要当军医。我指我是去救人而非杀人。

15.en: And their role in saving the human race. We must put aside doubts and guilt. You are the chosen people.
15.cn: 因为他们扮演着拯救人类的角色。我们不应该质疑和内疚。你们是被选中的人。

16.en: Yeah, well, he was being a hero last night. He dislocated his shoulder saving a kid from the bus crash.
16.cn: 是啊，他昨晚十分英勇，救下车祸中的孩子，导致肩膀脱臼。

17.en: On behalf of the Nova Corps, we'd like to express our profound gratitude for your help in saving Xandar.
17.cn: 我们想代表新星军团深深感谢各位协助拯救柴达。

18.en: Wow, this is really soft. Three hundred and fifty dollars? Down from 700. You're saving, like, 200 bucks.
18.cn: 是很柔软，350元? 从700块打折下来!你差不多省了200块!

19.en: Can that be explained by blow-in? No, it's my conclusion that he's saving and replanting seeds. Thank you.
19.cn: 那能用风吹解释吗？不能，我的结论是他在留种做二次耕种谢谢你。
